column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Started with spinach bread stuffed with cheese and spinach and pizza split in half - first half is the Malnati pizza with lean sausage
column2: mozzarella and tomato sauce on butter crust (so good) and second half is Lou's pizza with spinach
column5: onion and mushroom on garlic butter crust!! I would get the Malnati's pizza again. Overall a great experience.
